quotes.text: You’re not behind. You’re on your own timeline.
Overwhelm is temporary. You’ve done hard things before.
Take a breath. You’re allowed to slow down.
Progress isn’t always visible, but it’s real.
One small step forward is still forward.
You’re doing better than you think.
Let go of perfect. Focus on doing what you can.
Some days, surviving is its own victory.
You’re allowed to pause without guilt.
You can’t do everything. You were never meant to.
Your energy matters. Protect it kindly.
Every deep breath resets your nervous system.
